message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $850000 is significantly below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down a little further to $900000. This reflects the value of the product to you and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let me know if you're interested in this revised offer.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Given my financial situation, I am able to offer $875000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between our positions.
